Agent (2024-06-04 17:21:32.919692): Based on the information you've provided about the locations of the points of interest in your hometown, here's a suggested route to travel from the Retail Area to the Playground, visiting the other landmarks along the way:

1. Start at the Retail Area (center of town)
2. Travel 2 km north to reach the Hospital
3. From the Hospital, travel 2 km south to reach the Park
4. From the Park, travel 1 km north to reach the Library
5. From the Library, travel 1 km west to reach the High Street
6. Finally, from the High Street, travel 1 km east to reach the Playground (your destination)

So the complete route would be:
Retail Area -> Hospital -> Park -> Library -> High Street -> Playground

The total distance traveled would be approximately 7 km:
- 2 km (Retail Area to Hospital)
- 2 km (Hospital to Park)
- 1 km (Park to Library)
- 1 km (Library to High Street)
- 1 km (High Street to Playground)
